articles.author: James Cox
articles.title: Clare Daly angrily denounces EU over sanctions on Russia and calls it a 'tool' of Nato - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Irish MEP Clare Daly blasted the European Union this morning for being what she called a “tool” of Nato and the “military industrial complex”.
articles.content:
Irish MEP Clare Daly has attacked the European Union for being what she called a tool of Nato and the military industrial complex.
The Independents 4 Change MEP also accused the EU of engaging in mo… [+3034 chars]

articles.title: Food crisis: Hungry persons in West Africa to reach 38 million by June - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: A report issued by 11 international organisations working closely with the European Union on food emergency has said that 11 million more persons could go hungry in West Africa in the next three months, bringing the total number of hungry people in the region…

articles.title: Global Times: US ramps up oil imports from Russia, pursues own interests at expense of European allies amid Ukraine crisis - The Edge Markets MY
